DOC.HEAD: 231 Prisoners Released on King's Birthday
DOC.TEXT: Prison officials released 231 inmates serving sentences ranging from one month to 14 years, as part of Friday's celebration of Kilambs: Choice and prime wooled and shorn with no.1 and 2 pelts 100-110 lbs 58.00-60.00; 100-120 lbs 56.00-58.00; 120-130 lbs 52.00-56.00. Slaughter ewes: Utility and good 22.00-26.00. Cull 18.00-22.00. Few aged bucks 16.00-18.00. Feeder lambs: Choice and fancy 60-75 lbs 66.00-70.00; 75-90 lbs 60.00-66.00; 90-100 lbs 58.00-60.00. For the week: Compared to late last week, slaughter lambs steady to 2.00 higher. Slaughter ewes steady. Feeder lambs 2.00 lower.
